Package me.autobot.sim

Class Simulation.SimulationTimer

java.lang.Object
java.util.Timer
me.autobot.sim.Simulation.SimulationTimer
Enclosing class:
Simulation
public static class Simulation.SimulationTimer extends Timer
A timer that keeps track of the simulation time.

    • start

    • adjustMultiplier

      public void adjustMultiplier(double multiplier)
      Adjusts the multiplier of the simulation timer. This can be used to speed up or slow down the simulation.
      Parameters:
      multiplier - The multiplier to adjust the simulation by.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses the simulation timer.
